body: I wish the teacher turned out to be a bad guy and the girl and this boy ends up marrying

I skimmed the pages. No ugly old men in sight. A teacher get NTR'ed by a student could be a good plot, but the brat looks like a jerk and blackmails the girl. Even the teacher seems like a better human being than the student. IMO a good NTR is when the decent guy gets the girl. It'd be interesting if the girl was forced by the teacher and the boy rescued her. So... nah! Gonna pass.

no ugly bastard = significantly better ntr. 
NTR still sucks but its actually fappable when some homeless pig isn't talking half the page.
One of the few NTR I liked.

@BloodEagle last comment = if you have a problem with teachers fucking students you're gonna have a lot of problems on this site with all the other more fucked up tags and all the other loli doujins out there lol. teachers fucking students is pretty tame in comparison.

also I don't particularly like NTR but this was pretty good, atleast no ugly bastards visible and the art is actually amazing. 7/10
